name: Charm of Mana
effect:
:instant: Discard 2 cards, then draw 3 cards.

— OR —

:instant: Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card.
flavor_text: You come upon a caravan of gypsies who are feasting and fortifying their bodies with mead. They call you forward and say, "If you prove that you can dance the Rama-Buta, we will reward you." You don't know it, but try anyway. They laugh hysterically, but admire your bravery, giving you a strange charm.
